segments.text: I see the water running over the sink and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating such a large puddle, and the woman doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting wet, and the water is just pouring down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the dishes stacked on the counter, waiting to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she looks down soon and sees the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor must be getting slippery, and someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the water on her feet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will notice the water before the woman does.
segments.speaker: PAR
